thread.title: BRIEF-Addus HomeCare Announces Purchase Of Arcadia Home Care & Staffing Business

title: BRIEF-Addus HomeCare Announces Purchase Of Arcadia Home Care & Staffing Business

organizations.name: brief-addus homecare announces purchase of arcadia home care

text:
April 2, 2018 / 11:09 AM / Updated 12 minutes ago BRIEF-Addus HomeCare Announces Purchase Of Arcadia Home Care & Staffing Business Reuters Staff 
April 2 (Reuters) - Addus Homecare Corp: 
* ADDUS HOMECARE ANNOUNCES PURCHASE OF ARCADIA HOME CARE & STAFFING BUSINESS 
* ‍ADDUS CLOSED TRANSACTION ON APRIL 1, 2018, FOR A PURCHASE PRICE OF $18.5 MILLION​ 
* ‍ADDUS CLOSED TRANSACTION ON APRIL 1, 2018 WITH FUNDING FROM DELAYED DRAW TERM LOAN PORTION OF ITS CREDIT FACILITY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
